summary: Confirmed that tabindex functionality is properly implemented for keyboard navigation. The search input has tabIndex={1} (first priority), search button has tabIndex={2} (second priority), category buttons have tabIndex={3-7}, other/custom input has tabIndex={8}, and quick completion pills have tabIndex={9-12}. The AutoCompleteSearch component correctly accepts and uses the tabIndex prop.
current_status: Search interface tabindex is properly configured for logical keyboard navigation flow: search input → search button → category buttons → other elements. The search functionality should now work correctly with proper focus management.
